text: (mēlum, maṉitarkaḷai nōkkik kūṟumpaṭi ipṟāhīmukku kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭōm.) Kūṟuvīrāka! Pūmiyil nīṅkaḷ cuṟṟit tirintu pāruṅkaḷ. Ārampattil paṭaippukaḷai evvāṟu uṟpatti ceykiṟāṉ. (Avvāṟē maraṇitta) piṉṉarum allāh (maṟumaiyil) maṟumuṟaiyum uṟpatti ceyvāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh aṉaittiṉ mītum mikka āṟṟaluḷḷavaṉ
